00007 bool wxBackgroundBitmap::ProcessEvent(wxEvent &Event)
00008 {
00009         bool ret= Inherited::ProcessEvent( Event);
00010         if (Event.GetEventType() == wxEVT_ERASE_BACKGROUND) 
00011         {
00012                 if( this->m_p_parent== 0)
00013                         return ret;
00014                 wxEraseEvent &EraseEvent = dynamic_cast<wxEraseEvent &>(Event);
00015                 wxDC *dc= EraseEvent.GetDC();
00016                 dc->DrawBitmap( this->m_bitmap, this->m_p_parent->GetClientSize().GetWidth()- this->m_bitmap.GetWidth(), 0, true);
00017                 return true;
00018         } 
00019         return ret;
00020 }
